frameComponent5_title: HOW DO WE STRENGTHEN THE REGIONAL ECONOMIC POWER?
frameComponent5_intro: Modern mining technologies and advanced methods in extraction, digitization, energy efficiency, and occupational safety are essential components of the project. Training and further education of mining professionals are also emphasized.
frameComponent5_answers_investment_listI: Regional geological research and soil analysis through private investment in GIGA FIBER,
Provision of expertise and equipment for soil analysis,
Establishment of own mines for copper and lithium extraction,
Production of copper products and supply of lithium batteries to the automotive industry,
Use of extracted lithium for radio mast infrastructure on the test track for autonomous driving in the Karakalpakstan region,
frameComponent5_answers_economicImpact_l: New jobs increase the demand for housing, boosting attractiveness for residential investors.
The establishment of new mines promotes economic growth and settlement of workers in remote areas.
The mine allows for the extraction of various ores, meeting the demand for cable production and supplying the national automotive industry.
Mining and supplying national companies influence the production and export rate of the region and country.
frameComponent5_answers_internationalSta: Introduction of European mining practices and standards to increase competitiveness.
Building an effective value chain in the copper and lithium industry focused on export.
frameComponent5_answers_jobCreation_list: Mining requires numerous workers and collaboration with national, international, and local subcontractors.
Existing infrastructure is utilized and economic growth in the region is promoted.
Companies from the automotive industry / e-mobility create sites for workforce and knowledge exchange.
frameComponent5_q1_answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all items. Please ensure that the items are in their original packaging and condition. For more details, visit our returns page.
frameComponent5_q2_answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location. Typically, domestic orders take 3-5 business days, while international orders can take 7-14 business days.
frameComponent5_q3_answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. Shipping costs and delivery times will be calculated at checkout based on your location.
frameComponent5_q4_question: Can I change my order after placing it?
frameComponent5_q4_answer: If you need to make changes to your order, please contact us as soon as possible. We can only make changes if the order has not yet been processed or shipped.
frameComponent5_q5_question: How can I track my order?
frameComponent5_q5_answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this tracking number to check the status of your order on our shipping partner's website.
frameComponent6_title: HOW DO WE SUPPORT THE AUTOMOTIVE INDUSTRY?
frameComponent6_intro_part1: Autonomous driving aims at developing vehicles that can operate without human intervention. GIGA FIBER provides the technology for test tracks for autonomous driving. We provide the international automotive market with access to technology and infrastructure to further develop and test autonomous vehicles.
frameComponent6_intro_part2: Research in this field offers sustainable competitive advantages and expands domestic automotive production. A 100 km test track will be created to research autonomous vehicle systems.
frameComponent6_intro_part3: The technology promises extremely low latency and high data transfer rates, making it possible to transmit driving data almost in real-time. This is particularly important for communication between vehicles and infrastructure.
frameComponent6_intro_part4: Additionally, latency can be further reduced by processing data close to the vehicle, i.e., at the so-called 'edge' of the network, as data do not need to be sent to distant data centers.
frameComponent6_highlight: 5G/6G BASE STATIONS FROM GIGA FIBER HAVE EXTREMELY LOW LATENCY AND HIGH BANDWIDTHS ABOVE 1BIT/S. AREA-WIDE AND RELIABLE NETWORK COVERAGE AS WELL AS HIGH NETWORK DENSITY ENSURE A STABLE CONNECTION.
frameComponent6_infrastructure_paragraph: An e-mobility vehicle primarily consists of a battery (40% of the value) and connectivity for communication both during driving and charging. GIGA FIBER Technologies plans to acquire a lithium mine and establish a factory for the production of batteries and base stations. This factory will produce batteries needed for powering base stations.
frameComponent6_infrastructure_bullet1: Special interest for European EV manufacturers due to cost-effective production for a battery plant.
frameComponent6_infrastructure_bullet2: Creation of approx. 1000 new jobs in the factories.
frameComponent6_faq_question: Technology & Infrastructure Goals of Collaboration with GIGA FIBER
frameComponent6_img1_description: Use of 5G and 6G base stations is crucial for real-time communication between autonomous vehicles and infrastructure (V2X).
frameComponent6_img2_description: Highly secure data transmissions allow the test track to be used by numerous automotive manufacturers, maximizing the potential of domestic automotive manufacturers.
frameComponent6_img3_description: 5G and 6G internet infrastructure is suitable for creating numerous simulation environments that need to be replicated apart from real test drives.
frameComponent6_img4_description: The test area promotes research projects in the automotive industry, independent of production activities. The test area is the Karakalpakstan region.
frameComponent6_img5_description: Expansion of a resilient and redundant fiber optic infrastructure in the region, which transmits research results over highly secure connections.
frameComponent6_img6_description: High interest from established Chinese manufacturers.
frameComponent7_title: HOW DO WE PROMOTE GROWTH AND DIGITAL INTEGRATION?
frameComponent7_intro: The previous projects – the extraction of copper and lithium and the construction of an autonomous test track – provide significant economic impulses in Uzbekistan. They not only create jobs but also contribute to social development and lay the foundation for sustainable economic development. These advancements lay the groundwork for our new venture: GIGA FIBER Connectivity. Using the copper and lithium resources from the mines and the existing 5G/6G infrastructure, this project aims to further advance the digital transformation of the country.
frameComponent7_intro2: The continuous expansion of network infrastructure in the country provides the basis for future digital transformation. This includes the establishment of fiber optic networks, the introduction of innovative technologies, and the expansion of digital services. GIGA FIBER’s goal is to create a comprehensive digital infrastructure that meets international standards and supports the development of digital services and technologies.
frameComponent7_title5: GIGA FIBER IS AN INNOVATIVE TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMPANY FOCUSING ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF FUTURE-ORIENTED NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE.
frameComponent7_intro3: Our expertise lies in the planning, implementation, and operation of state-of-the-art telecommunications networks, including fiber optic and wireless technologies. We work closely with partners from various industries to promote technological innovations and support the digital transformation of businesses and societies.
frameComponent7_intro4: Through strategic partnerships and investments, we aim to drive digital integration and contribute to the long-term economic development of the region.
